articles.title: GM lays off hundreds of salaried workers as part of profit push - The Detroit News
articles.description: Most of the cuts occurred at the automaker's Warren Technical Center and were due to "business conditions," the company told affected workers.
articles.content:
General Motors Co. cut hundreds of jobs on Friday, just days after raising its profit guidance for the year in a move that sent the shares soaring.

articles.title: OpenAI buys Sky, an AI interface for Mac - TechCrunch
